name: Pivotal API Comments Service
description:
As an application developer,
I want to query the Comments of the Pivotal API,
So that my app can consume those responses.

steps.name: the "GET" request to "/projects/<project_id>/stories/<story_id>/comments/<comment_id>" is sent
the response status code should be 200

the response body should be verified with:
| key               | value               |
| id                | <comment_id>        |
| text              | AUTO new comment    |
the response schema should be verified with "schema_comments.json"

the following request body parameters:
| key   | value             |
| text  | AUTO new comment  |
the "POST" request to "/projects/<project_id>/stories/<story_id>/comments" is sent
the response status code should be 200

the response body should be verified with:
| key   | value               |
| id    | <comment_id>        |
| text  | AUTO new comment    |
the response schema should be verified with "schema_comments.json"

name: Pivotal API Epics Service
description:
As an application developer,
I want to query the Epics of the Pivotal API,
So that my app can consume those responses.

steps.name: the "GET" request to "/projects/<project_id>/epics" is sent
the response status code should be 200

the response body should be verified with:
| key               | value               |
| name              | AUTO_NEW_EPIC       |
| id                | <epic_id>           |
| kind              | epic                |
the response schema should be verified with "schema_epics.json"

the following request body parameters:
| key               | value               |
| name              | AUTO_NEW_EPIC       |
the "POST" request to "/projects/<project_id>/epics" is sent
the response status code should be 200

the response body should be verified with:
| key               | value               |
| name              | AUTO_NEW_EPIC       |
| id                | <epic_id>           |
| kind              | epic                |
the response schema should be verified with "schema_epics.json"
the "GET" request to "/projects/<project_id>/epics/<epic_id>" is sent
the response status code should be 200

the response body should be verified with:
| key               | value               |
| name              | AUTO_NEW_EPIC       |
| id                | <epic_id>           |
| kind              | epic                |
the response schema should be verified with "schema_epics.json"

the following request body parameters:
| key               | value                |
| name              | AUTO_UPDATED_EPIC    |
the "PUT" request to "/projects/<project_id>/epics/<epic_id>" is sent
the response status code should be 200

the response body should be verified with:
| key               | value               |
| name              | AUTO_UPDATED_EPIC   |
| id                | <epic_id>           |
| kind              | epic                |
the response schema should be verified with "schema_epics.json"
the "DELETE" request to "/projects/<project_id>/epics/<epic_id>" is sent
the response status code should be 204
the "GET" request to "/projects/<project_id>/epics/<epic_id>" is sent
the response status code should be 404
the response schema should be verified with "schema_error.json"
the "GET" request to "/epics/<epic_id>" is sent
the response status code should be 200

the response body should be verified with:
| key               | value               |
| name              | AUTO_NEW_EPIC       |
| id                | <epic_id>           |
| kind              | epic                |
the response schema should be verified with "schema_epics.json"

elements.name: Cannot Post an epic with an invalid parameter

steps.name:
the following request body parameters:
| key               | value               |
| name              | |
| description       | name field is empty |
the "POST" request to "/projects/<project_id>/epics" is sent
the response status code should be 400

the response body should be verified with:
| key               | value               |
| code              | invalid_parameter   |
| kind              | error               |
the response schema should be verified with "schema_error.json"

elements.name: Cannot Post an epic with a duplicated name

steps.name:
the following request body parameters:
| key               | value               |
| name              | AUTO_NEW_EPIC       |
| description       | name field is empty |
the "POST" request to "/projects/<project_id>/epics" is sent
the response status code should be 400

the response body should be verified with:
| key               | value               |
| code              | invalid_parameter   |
| kind              | error               |
the response schema should be verified with "schema_error.json"

elements.name: Cannot Get an epic from project with invalid id

steps.name: the "GET" request to "/projects/<project_id>/epics/<epic_id>invalid" is sent
the response status code should be 400

the response body should be verified with:
| key               | value               |
| code              | invalid_parameter   |
| general_problem   | Invalid resource ids|
the response schema should be verified with "schema_error.json"

name: Pivotal API Iterations Service
description:
As an application developer,
I want to query the Iterations of the Pivotal API,
So that my app can consume those responses.

steps.name: the "GET" request to "/projects/<project_id>/iterations" is sent
the response status code should be 200

the response body should be verified with:
| key               | value               |
| length            | 2                   |
| kind              | iteration           |
| team_strength     | 1                   |
| number            | 1                   |
the response schema should be verified with "schema_iterations.json"
the "GET" request to "/projects/<project_id>/iterations/1" is sent
the response status code should be 200

the response body should be verified with:
| key               | value               |
| length            | 2                   |
| kind              | iteration           |
| team_strength     | 1                   |
| number            | 1                   |
the response schema should be verified with "schema_iterations.json"

the following request body parameters:
| key               | value               |
| length            | 4                   |
| team_strength     | 2                   |
the "PUT" request to "/projects/<project_id>/iteration_overrides/1" is sent
the response status code should be 200

the response body should be verified with:
| key               | value               |
| length            | 4                   |
| kind              | iteration_override  |
| team_strength     | 2                   |
| number            | 1                   |
the response schema should be verified with "schema_iteration_overrides.json"

elements.name: Get the analytics of an iteration

steps.name: the "GET" request to "/projects/<project_id>/iterations/1/analytics" is sent
the response status code should be 200

the response body should be verified with:
| key               | value               |
| kind              | analytics           |
the response schema should be verified with "schema_analytics.json"

elements.name: Get time details of an iteration

steps.name: the "GET" request to "/projects/<project_id>/iterations/1/analytics/cycle_time_details" is sent
the response status code should be 200

the response body should be verified with:
| key               | value               |
| kind              | cycle_time_details  |
| started_count     | 1                   |
the response schema should be verified with "schema_cycle_time.json"

elements.name: Cannot Get all iterations with an invalid project_id

steps.name: the "GET" request to "/projects/<project_id>invalid/iterations" is sent
the response status code should be 404

the response body should be verified with:
| key               | value                                        |
| code              | route_not_found                              |
| kind              | error                                        |
| error             | The path you requested has no valid endpoint.|
the response schema should be verified with "schema_error.json"

elements.name: Cannot Get an iteration with an unexciting iteration_id

steps.name: the "GET" request to "/projects/<project_id>/iterations/2" is sent
the response status code should be 400

the response body should be verified with:
| key               | value                                                 |
| code              | invalid_parameter                                     |
| kind              | error                                                 |
| error             | One or more request parameters was missing or invalid.|
| general_problem   | iteration not found                                   |
the response schema should be verified with "schema_error.json"

elements.name: Cannot PUT iteration's information with an invalid id

steps.name:
the following request body parameters:
| key               | value               |
| length            | 4                   |
| team_strength     | 2                   |
the "PUT" request to "/projects/<project_id>/iteration_overrides/2" is sent
the response status code should be 400

the response body should be verified with:
| key               | value                                                                                             |
| code              | invalid_parameter                                                                                 |
| kind              | error                                                                                             |
| error             | One or more request parameters was missing or invalid.                                            |
| general_problem   | The iteration's 'number' must not be greater than the last Backlog iteration that contains a story|
| requirement       | Currently the last iteration number is 1                                                          |
the response schema should be verified with "schema_iteration_overrides_error.json"

elements.name: Cannot Get the analytics of an iteration with an unexciting iteration_id

steps.name: the "GET" request to "/projects/<project_id>/iterations/2/analytics" is sent
the response status code should be 400

the response body should be verified with:
| key               | value                                                        |
| code              | invalid_parameter                                            |
| kind              | error                                                        |
| error             | One or more request parameters was missing or invalid.       |
| general_problem   | Iteration number can't be greater than the current iteration.|
the response schema should be verified with "schema_error.json"

elements.name: Cannot Get time details of an iteration with an unexciting iteration_id

steps.name: the "GET" request to "/projects/<project_id>/iterations/2/analytics/cycle_time_details" is sent
the response status code should be 400

the response body should be verified with:
| key               | value                                                     |
| code              | invalid_parameter                                         |
| kind              | error                                                     |
| error             | One or more request parameters was missing or invalid.    |
| general_problem   | Iteration ID cannot be greater than the current iteration.|
the response schema should be verified with "schema_error.json"

name: Pivotal API Projects Service
description:
As an application developer,
I want to query the Projects of the Pivotal API,
So that my app can consume those responses.

steps.name: the "GET" request to "/projects" is sent
the response status code should be 200
the response schema should be verified with "schema_projects.json"
the "GET" request to "/projects/<project_id>" is sent
the response status code should be 200

the response body should be verified with:
| key               | value               |
| id                | <project_id>        |
| name              | AUTO_NEW_PROJECT    |
| iteration_length  | 2                   |
| week_start_day    | Monday              |
the response schema should be verified with "schema_projects.json"

the following request body parameters:
| key               | value               |
| name              | AUTO_NEW_PROJECT    |
| iteration_length  | 2                   |
| week_start_day    | Monday              |
the "POST" request to "/projects" is sent
the response status code should be 200

the response body should be verified with:
| key               | value               |
| id                | <project_id>        |
| name              | AUTO_NEW_PROJECT    |
| iteration_length  | 2                   |
| week_start_day    | Monday              |
the response schema should be verified with "schema_projects.json"

the following request body parameters:
| key               | value               |
| name              | AUTO_UPDATED_PROJECT|
| iteration_length  | 3                   |
| week_start_day    | Saturday            |
the "PUT" request to "/projects/<project_id>" is sent
the response status code should be 200

the response body should be verified with:
| key               | value               |
| id                | <project_id>        |
| name              | AUTO_UPDATED_PROJECT|
| iteration_length  | 3                   |
| week_start_day    | Saturday            |
the response schema should be verified with "schema_projects.json"
the "DELETE" request to "/projects/<project_id>" is sent
the response status code should be 204
the "GET" request to "/projects/<project_id>" is sent
the response status code should be 403

elements.name: Cannot create Project with no Iteration length

steps.name:
the following request body parameters:
| key               | value               |
| name              | AUTO_NEW_PROJECT    |
| iteration_length  | 0                   |
the "POST" request to "/projects" is sent
the response status code should be 400

elements.name: Cannot create two projects with the same name

steps.name:
the following request body parameters:
| key               | value               |
| name              | AUTO_NEW_PROJECT    |
| iteration_length  | 3                   |
| week_start_day    | Saturday            |
the "POST" request to "/projects" is sent
the response status code should be 400

elements.name: Cannot update project's name to empty name

steps.name:
the following request body parameters:
| key               | value               |
| name              |                     |
the "PUT" request to "/projects/<project_id>" is sent
the response status code should be 400

name: Pivotal API Stories Service
description:
As an application developer,
I want to query the Stories of the Pivotal API,
So that my app can consume those responses.

steps.name: the "GET" request to "/projects/<project_id>/stories" is sent
the response status code should be 200
the response schema should be verified with "schema_stories.json"
the "GET" request to "/projects/<project_id>/stories/<story_id>" is sent
the response status code should be 200

the response body should be verified with:
| key               | value               |
| id                | <story_id>          |
| name              | AUTO_TEST_STORY     |
| description       | default payload     |
| story_type        | feature             |
the response schema should be verified with "schema_stories.json"

the following request body parameters:
| key               | value               |
| name              | AUTO_TEST_STORY     |
| description       | default payload     |
| story_type        | feature             |
the "POST" request to "/projects/<project_id>/stories" is sent
the response status code should be 200

the response body should be verified with:
| key               | value               |
| id                | <story_id>          |
| name              | AUTO_TEST_STORY     |
| description       | default payload     |
| story_type        | feature             |
the response schema should be verified with "schema_stories.json"

the following request body parameters:
| key               | value               |
| name              | AUTO_UPDATED_STORY  |
| description       | updated payload     |
| story_type        | feature             |
the "PUT" request to "/projects/<project_id>/stories/<story_id>" is sent
the response status code should be 200

the response body should be verified with:
| key               | value               |
| id                | <story_id>          |
| name              | AUTO_UPDATED_STORY  |
| description       | updated payload     |
| story_type        | feature             |
the response schema should be verified with "schema_stories.json"
the "DELETE" request to "/projects/<project_id>/stories/<story_id>" is sent
the response status code should be 204
the "GET" request to "/projects/<project_id>/stories/<story_id>" is sent
the response status code should be 404

steps.name:

name: Pivotal API Transitions Service
description:
As an application developer,
I want to query the Transitions of the Pivotal API,
So that my app can consume those responses.

elements.name: Get a list with all story transitions in a project

steps.name: the "GET" request to "/projects/<project_id>/story_transitions" is sent
the response status code should be 200

the response body should be verified with:
| key               | value               |
| kind              | story_transition    |
| state             | started             |
the response schema should be verified with "schema_transitions.json"

elements.name: Get a list with the transitions of a specific story in a project

steps.name: the "GET" request to "/projects/<project_id>/stories/<story_id>/transitions" is sent
the response status code should be 200

the response body should be verified with:
| key               | value               |
| kind              | story_transition    |
| state             | started             |
the response schema should be verified with "schema_transitions.json"

elements.name: Cannot Get a list with all story transitions with an invalid project_id

steps.name: the "GET" request to "/projects/<project_id>invalid/story_transitions" is sent
the response status code should be 404

the response body should be verified with:
| key               | value                                        |
| code              | route_not_found                              |
| kind              | error                                        |
| error             | The path you requested has no valid endpoint.|
the response schema should be verified with "schema_error.json"

the response status code should be 404

the response body should be verified with:
| key               | value                                        |
| code              | route_not_found                              |
| kind              | error                                        |
| error             | The path you requested has no valid endpoint.|
the response schema should be verified with "schema_error.json"

| kind              | error                                        |

name: Pivotal UI Comments
description:
As a Pivotal user,
I want to create, manage and delete comments,
So that my Story is up to date.

steps.name: The user is logged on pivotal website as "admin"
the user selects the project "AUTO_NEW_PROJECT" on Project Dashboard
the user selects the "AUTO_TEST_STORY" story
the comment information should be displayed in the story panel

steps.name: The user is logged on pivotal website as "admin"
the user selects the project "AUTO_NEW_PROJECT" on Project Dashboard
the user selects the "AUTO_TEST_STORY" story
the user posts the "AUTO new comment" comment
the comment information should be displayed in the story panel
The user is logged on pivotal website as "admin"
the user selects the project "AUTO_NEW_PROJECT" on Project Dashboard
the user selects the "AUTO_TEST_STORY" story
the user updates the comment "AUTO new comment" with text "AUTO updated comment"
the comment information should be displayed in the story panel
The user is logged on pivotal website as "admin"
the user selects the project "AUTO_NEW_PROJECT" on Project Dashboard
the user selects the "AUTO_TEST_STORY" story
the user deletes the "AUTO new comment" comment
the "AUTO new comment" comment should not be present in the panel
The user is logged on pivotal website as "admin"
the user selects the project "AUTO_NEW_PROJECT" on Project Dashboard
the user selects the "AUTO_TEST_STORY" story
the user posts the "AUTO new comment" comment with attachment "image.jpg"
the comment information should be displayed in the story panel

name: Pivotal UI Stories
description:
As a Pivotal user,
I want to create, manage and delete stories,
So that my Project is up to date.

steps.name: the user is logged on pivotal website as "admin"
the user selects the project "AUTO_NEW_PROJECT" on Project Dashboard
the user selects the "AUTO_TEST_STORY" story
the user is logged on pivotal website as "admin"
the user selects the project "AUTO_NEW_PROJECT" on Project Dashboard
the user clicks the "Add Story" button in the Current/Backlog Panel

the user fills the Story form with:
| key           | value           |
| name          | AUTO_TEST_STORY |
| description   | default payload |
| story_type    | feature         |
the user selects the "AUTO_TEST_STORY" story
the user is logged on pivotal website as "admin"
the user selects the project "AUTO_NEW_PROJECT" on Project Dashboard
the user selects the "AUTO_TEST_STORY" story

the user fills the Story form with:
| key           | value               |
| name          | AUTO_UPDATED_STORY  |
| description   | updated payload     |
| story_type    | feature             |
the user selects the "AUTO_UPDATED_STORY" story
the user is logged on pivotal website as "admin"
the user selects the project "AUTO_NEW_PROJECT" on Project Dashboard
the user selects the "AUTO_TEST_STORY" story
the user deletes the story from the story edit section
the story should not be present in the panel

name: Pivotal UI Tasks
description:
As a Pivotal user,
I want to create, manage and delete tasks,
So that my Stories are up to date.

steps.name: the user is logged on pivotal website as "admin"
the user selects the project "AUTO_NEW_PROJECT" on Project Dashboard
the user selects the "AUTO_TEST_STORY" story
the tasks information displayed in the story panel is verified
the user is logged on pivotal website as "admin"
the user selects the project "AUTO_NEW_PROJECT" on Project Dashboard
the user selects the "AUTO_TEST_STORY" story
the user creates a new Task with name "AUTO_NEW_TASK"
the tasks information displayed in the story panel is verified
the user is logged on pivotal website as "admin"
the user selects the project "AUTO_NEW_PROJECT" on Project Dashboard
the user selects the "AUTO_TEST_STORY" story
the user updates the Task "AUTO_NEW_TASK" with name "AUTO_UPDATED_TASK"
the tasks information displayed in the story panel is verified
the user is logged on pivotal website as "admin"
the user selects the project "AUTO_NEW_PROJECT" on Project Dashboard
